LanguageData.Hare.label: giorria
LanguageData.Hare.description: Is féidir leis an ainmhí luibhiteach seo rith go tapa.
LanguageData.Hare.tools.head.label: ceann
LanguageData.Snowhare.label: giorria sneachta
LanguageData.Snowhare.description: Maireann an t-ainmhí beag seo i dteocht an-íseal.
LanguageData.Snowhare.tools.head.label: ceann
